alert.note: Alert for Daniels; Sheridan (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 1:27PM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Daniels and northwestern Sheridan Counties through 230 PM MDT... At 126 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Port Of Scobey, or 11 miles northwest of Scobey, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scobey, Flaxville, Port Of Scobey, Redstone, Archer, Port Of Whitetail, Whitetail, Madoc, Outlook, Daleview, Four Buttes and Navajo. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
